name: Bakunawa
desc:
Scoured by the ravages of time, the power of the Wayob still harbored within the Calamity of Eshu awakens, as though sensing the presence of a nemesis from 500 years before.
Use this power to defend against Bakunawa's attacks. After successfully fending off a special move, the Wayob will unleash a powerful counterblow.

imgDesc.text:
Scoured by the ravages of time, the power of the Wayob still harbored within the Calamity of Eshu awakens, as though sensing the presence of a nemesis from 500 years before.
Use this power to defend against Bakunawa's attacks. After successfully fending off a special move, the Wayob will unleash a powerful counterblow.

Once struck by the Wayob's counterblow, Bakunawa will be temporarily paralyzed. Seize this opportunity to unleash the power of the Calamity of Eshu and attack Bakunawa's weak spots for a chance to sever its limbs.

Attack with the full power of the Calamity of Eshu when Bakunawa is at its weakest to thoroughly defeat it. Though as legends tell of the terrifying monster's powers of revival, it remains to be seen if it might one day rise again...
